mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fi_engineerinvoice_condition( id, order_id, order_no, service_point_id, engineer_id, product_category_id, product_id, service_type_id, payment_type, status, charge_order_type, auto_charge_flag, charge_date, charge_by, order_close_date, insurance_no, quarter ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{orderNo}, #{servicePointId}, #{engineerId}, #{productCategoryId}, #{productId}, #{serviceTypeId}, #{paymentType}, #{status}, #{chargeOrderType}, #{autoChargeFlag}, #{chargeDate}, #{chargeBy}, #{orderCloseDate}, #{insuranceNo} #{quarter} )
